author: gcolvin
content:
> we can always adjust the gas costs to discourage behavior that leads to the highest inefficiencies (just by making jumps more expensive?)
That seems like trying to incorporate the cost of gas counting into the gas model itself.

author: .vbuterin
content: yep! And what's wrong with that?

author: .vbuterin
content: There's no infinite regress problem; it just means the constants that are there anyway get adjusted to different numbers
